content: Acknowledged. I understand that the guidelines and requirements for writing the draft include starting with a clear and concise introduction, writing in a conversational tone that is easy to understand and engaging, avoiding repetitive content, using proper structure, tone of voice, and formatting style, and following any guidelines or requirements you set such as word count, tone, or formatting style. I will also ensure that the article strictly follows the Australian English language, and use Australian English spellings for words like "colour" instead of "color," and generate the output in markdown format.
